items.use_case: Prioritize product roadmap items based on impact
items.prompt: Review this list of upcoming product initiatives. Use the data provided (impact scores, effort estimates, and strategic alignment notes) to suggest priority order. Present the reordered list with justification for each recommendation. [Insert initiative list]
items.superPrompt: Review this list of upcoming product initiatives. Use the data provided (impact scores, effort estimates, and strategic alignment notes) to suggest priority order. Present the reordered list with justification for each recommendation. {{ field1 || Insert initiative list}}

items.prompt: We’re considering pricing changes. Based on this product value and audience, suggest 3 monetization strategies. Include pros, cons, and examples of companies using each. [Insert product and audience details]
items.superPrompt: We’re considering pricing changes. Based on this product value and audience, suggest 3 monetization strategies. Include pros, cons, and examples of companies using each. {{ field1 || Insert product and audience details}}

items.use_case: Draft a vision statement for the product
items.prompt: Based on this long-term goal and user need, write a concise product vision statement. Keep it inspiring and grounded in real outcomes. [Insert product goal]
items.superPrompt: Based on this long-term goal and user need, write a concise product vision statement. Keep it inspiring and grounded in real outcomes. {{ field1 || Insert product goal}}

items.use_case: Brainstorm feature ideas from customer feedback
items.prompt: Review this batch of customer feedback from the past quarter. Identify pain points and generate a list of 5 feature ideas to address recurring themes. [Insert feedback or summary]
items.superPrompt: Review this batch of customer feedback from the past quarter. Identify pain points and generate a list of 5 feature ideas to address recurring themes. {{ field1 || Insert feedback or summary}}

items.prompt: Review this list of product UI changes and propose 2 A/B test setups. Include hypothesis, success metrics, and potential outcomes. [Insert UI changes or user goals]
items.superPrompt: Review this list of product UI changes and propose 2 A/B test setups. Include hypothesis, success metrics, and potential outcomes. {{ field1 || Insert UI changes or user goals}}

items.use_case: Draft PRD for a new feature
items.prompt: Based on this feature idea and customer need, write a first-draft PRD. Include user story, problem statement, solution overview, acceptance criteria, and success metrics. [Insert context or problem]
items.superPrompt: Based on this feature idea and customer need, write a first-draft PRD. Include user story, problem statement, solution overview, acceptance criteria, and success metrics. {{ field1 || Insert context or problem}}

items.prompt: Using this release summary, draft user-facing changelog notes for our next version release. Use a friendly, clear tone and group by category (e.g., new, improved, fixed). [Insert release notes or ticket list]
items.superPrompt: Using this release summary, draft user-facing changelog notes for our next version release. Use a friendly, clear tone and group by category (e.g., new, improved, fixed). {{ field1 || Insert release notes or ticket list}}

items.prompt: Draft an internal FAQ for our sales and support teams about our upcoming feature launch. Use this background and anticipated questions. Write in a confident, informative tone. [Insert feature and launch details]
items.superPrompt: Draft an internal FAQ for our sales and support teams about our upcoming feature launch. Use this background and anticipated questions. Write in a confident, informative tone. {{ field1 || Insert feature and launch details}}

items.prompt: Based on this feature description, write 3 versions of a clear, compelling one-sentence value proposition. Tailor each one to a different target audience. [Insert feature description]
items.superPrompt: Based on this feature description, write 3 versions of a clear, compelling one-sentence value proposition. Tailor each one to a different target audience. {{ field1 || Insert feature description}}

items.use_case: Draft pitch deck for new product
items.prompt: Create a 5-slide outline for a pitch deck introducing our new product to internal stakeholders. Include problem, solution, market, product overview, and timeline. [Insert product idea]
items.superPrompt: Create a 5-slide outline for a pitch deck introducing our new product to internal stakeholders. Include problem, solution, market, product overview, and timeline. {{ field1 || Insert product idea}}

items.prompt: Create a user journey map for our [insert user persona] going through [insert experience]. Include emotional highs/lows, touchpoints, and moments of friction. Output as a visual flow.
items.superPrompt: Create a user journey map for our {{ field1 || insert user persona}} going through {{ field2 || insert experience}}. Include emotional highs/lows, touchpoints, and moments of friction. Output as a visual flow.

items.prompt: Generate a wireframe-style image of a 3-step onboarding flow for a finance app. Steps include: linking an account, setting financial goals, and reviewing suggestions. Style: greyscale wireframe with labels.
items.superPrompt: Generate a wireframe-style image of a 3-step onboarding flow for a finance app. Steps include: linking an account, setting financial goals, and reviewing suggestions. Style: greyscale wireframe with labels.

items.prompt: Create a side-by-side visual comparison of two app dashboards: one cluttered with too many metrics, and one simplified with actionable insights. Style: dashboard UI, minimalistic, neutral branding.
items.superPrompt: Create a side-by-side visual comparison of two app dashboards: one cluttered with too many metrics, and one simplified with actionable insights. Style: dashboard UI, minimalistic, neutral branding.

items.prompt: Generate a user journey infographic showing the onboarding experience for a mobile health-tracking app. Include key milestones, emotions, and friction points. Style: infographic, vertical layout, soft colors.
items.superPrompt: Generate a user journey infographic showing the onboarding experience for a mobile health-tracking app. Include key milestones, emotions, and friction points. Style: infographic, vertical layout, soft colors.

items.prompt: Analyze this set of user feedback and identify the 4 most frequent themes. Summarize each with example quotes and suggested product implications. [Insert feedback or data dump]
items.superPrompt: Analyze this set of user feedback and identify the 4 most frequent themes. Summarize each with example quotes and suggested product implications. {{ field1 || Insert feedback or data dump}}

items.prompt: Based on the following product usage data, summarize 3 key behavioral trends and what they suggest about user needs. Recommend 2 follow-up investigations. [Insert data or summary]
items.superPrompt: Based on the following product usage data, summarize 3 key behavioral trends and what they suggest about user needs. Recommend 2 follow-up investigations. {{ field1 || Insert data or summary}}

items.prompt: Review our product rollout plan and highlight 5 risks to successful adoption. Include likelihood, impact, and mitigation recommendations. [Insert rollout plan or summary]
items.superPrompt: Review our product rollout plan and highlight 5 risks to successful adoption. Include likelihood, impact, and mitigation recommendations. {{ field1 || Insert rollout plan or summary}}

items.prompt: Review the results of our recent A/B test (test vs. control). Identify statistical significance, key metrics that changed, and recommend next steps. Present insights clearly with graphs if needed. [Upload test data]
items.superPrompt: Review the results of our recent A/B test (test vs. control). Identify statistical significance, key metrics that changed, and recommend next steps. Present insights clearly with graphs if needed. {{ field1 || Upload test data}}

items.use_case: Compare feature adoption across customer segments
items.prompt: Use this data to compare how small business vs. enterprise customers adopt our key features. Highlight major differences, usage frequencies, and retention impact. Format output as a table with insights. [Upload CSV or describe dataset]
items.superPrompt: Use this data to compare how small business vs. enterprise customers adopt our key features. Highlight major differences, usage frequencies, and retention impact. Format output as a table with insights. {{ field1 || Upload CSV or describe dataset}}
